thread.section_title: Gym Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Direct | www.gymdirect.com.au
thread.title: Andrew Steinhuebl
thread.title_full: Gym Direct reviewed by Andrew Steinhuebl

author: Andrew Steinhuebl
title: Andrew Steinhuebl
text: Great service and communication makes this shop a must. The product came in pieces so assembly was required. All the screws where there plus extra and screw driver. I decided to do it by hand, about 45mins to assemble. It all fit like a glove, solid and strong ready to jump on. A great product, highly recommended and a great price.
